SEARCH
Package com.marianobonansea.chat_app.controller

Class ChatController

java.lang.Object
com.marianobonansea.chat_app.controller.ChatController
@Controller public class ChatController extends Object
Controller that handles chat-related operations. Manages message sending and chat view rendering. This controller provides endpoints for both WebSocket messaging and HTTP requests.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Mariano Bonansea

  • Constructor Details

    • ChatController

      public ChatController()

  • Method Details

    • sendMessage

      @MessageMapping("/sendMessage") @SendTo("/topic/messages") public ChatMessage sendMessage(ChatMessage message)
      Handles incoming messages and forwards them to all subscribed clients. Messages are received through WebSocket connection and broadcast to all subscribers.
      Parameters:
      message - The received chat message containing sender and content
      Returns:
      The message to be sent to all clients

    • redirectToChat

      @GetMapping("/") public String redirectToChat()
      Handles the root path and redirects to the chat interface. This endpoint serves as the entry point of the application.
      Returns:
      A redirect instruction to the chat endpoint

    • chat

      @GetMapping("/chat") public String chat()
      Returns the chat view template. This endpoint renders the main chat interface where users can exchange messages.
      Returns:
      The name of the chat view template to be rendered
